incidents.title: radon.onecorp.eu Migration
incidents.content:
We are migrating radon.onecorp.eu to another system. Please expect short interruptions between 18:00 and 22:00 (GMT+2).

We will update this incident once more information becomes available.

incidents.title: High temperature at site DUS6
incidents.description:
Since 13:50 (UTC) there are temperature problems at site DUS6 which leads to emergency shutdown of some servers.
Our technicians and the technicians from the data center are already working with high pressure on a solution.
incidents.content:
Since 13:50 (UTC) there are temperature problems at site DUS6 which leads to emergency shutdown of some servers. Our technicians and the technicians from the data center are already working with high pressure on a solution.

2021-06-17T21:26:21.000Z
Resolved

The reason for the high temperatures was a failure of a climate box. The malfunction has been repaired and the temperatures are returning to normal.

incidents.title: Network Infrastructure maintenance
incidents.description: We are upgrading network equipment in Frankfurt
incidents.content:
We are upgrading network equipment in Frankfurt am Main. Expect short network interruptions (< 1min) for servers located in Frankfurt.

2021-04-07T15:03:48.568Z
Resolved

Maintenance is now complete.
